Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription:
Blue Line trains are experiencing delays leaving O'Hare.
Expect longer than usual wait times.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are experiencing delays leaving O'Hare.

Expect longer than usual wait times.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Division
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Division due to a sick customer.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Division due to a sick customer.

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
